card-group.name: Credit Cards
card-group.group-description:
Credit cards offer a revolving line of credit, allowing you to carry your balance forward from month to month rather than paying the amount owing in full. However, a minimum repayment amount each month will need to be honoured.

If you choose to pay your balance in full and on time, interest charges will not be applicable. Our credit cards also offer you automatic enrolment into our Membership Rewards programs, so you can benefit from spending on your Card.

card.name: American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card
card.top-features:
• Complimentary Virgin Blue domestic or international economy return flight1 (see destination guide) or a night's stay in one of our selected luxury hotels2 each year.
  • Earn 1.5 Membership Rewards points for every dollar spent3, up to $100,000 p.a.
card.benefits:
• - A complimentary Virgin Blue domestic or international economy return flight1 (see flight destination guide) or a night’s stay in one of our selected luxury hotels2 each year.
  • - Complimentary Priority Pass membership including 2 lounge passes per year3.
  • - Overseas and Domestic Travel Insurance4.
card.rewards-features:
• - Complimentary enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent5.
  • - $1 spent = 1.5 Membership Rewards points up to $100,000 p.a. (reset thereafter).
card.terms:
• All flights are subject to availability and American Express does not guarantee that seats nor tickets will be available on the dates or at the times you may wish to fly. Seat availability may be limited to certain dates and/or flights and it may be more difficult to book seats around public holidays, school holidays or special events. Some flights may not have any seats available for redemption. Route availability is subject to change without notice. All travel is subject to the American Express Flight Offer Conditions.
  • Hotel night stay is based on a standard room with two people sharing and must be booked two weeks in advance of stay. Subject to availability. Blackout dates may apply.
  • Subject to Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Earn 1.5 Membership Rewards points per dollar spent up to $100,000 p.a. reverting to 1 point per dollar spent thereafter (reset annually).
card.terms-full:
• All flights are subject to availability and American Express does not guarantee that seats nor tickets will be available on the dates or at the times you may wish to fly. Seat availability may be limited to certain dates and/or flights and it may be more difficult to book seats around public holidays, school holidays or special events. Some flights may not have any seats available for redemption. Route availability is subject to change without notice. All travel is subject to the American Express Flight Offer Conditions.
  • Hotel night stay is based on a standard room with two people sharing and must be booked two weeks in advance of stay. Subject to availability. Blackout dates may apply.
  • The first 2 visits within each 12-month membership period are complimentary to the basic Card member only, after which every visit would be charged as per the prevailing rates; currently USD27 per person. Any accompanying guests will be charged USD27 per visit, which will be automatically charged on the Card member’s American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card. Unused visits cannot be carried forward to the following year of membership. The number of complimentary visits will be reset to 2 per each 12-month period. Renewal terms and conditions are at the discretion of Priority Pass Ltd.
  • American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card Insurances are underwritten by ACE Insurance Limited (ABN 23 001 642 020, AFSL No. 239687) (ACE) and are subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions contained in the American Express Platinum Reserve Credit Card Insurances policy of insurance between American Express Australia Limited (ABN 92 108 952 085, AFSL No. 291313) (American Express) and ACE. This site does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. It is important for you to read the Terms and Conditions available here and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here.
  • All Interest Rates are quoted as an Annual Percentage Rate. All information is correct as at 16 December 2010 and is subject to change.

card.name: American Express Platinum Edge Credit Card
card.top-features:
• Complimentary Virgin Blue domestic economy return flight (see destination guide) each year1.
  • Earn points up to 3x faster with Membership Rewards 3-2-12.
card.benefits:
• - A complimentary Virgin Blue domestic economy return flight (see flight destination guide) each year1.
  • - Complimentary Domestic and International Travel Insurance2.
card.rewards-features:
• - Complimentary enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent3.
  • - Earn points up to 3x faster with Membership Rewards 3-2-13:
      - 3 points at major supermarkets
      - 2 points at major petrol stations
      - 1 point on other purchases
card.terms:
• All flights are subject to availability and American Express does not guarantee that seats nor tickets will be available on the dates or at the times you may wish to fly. Seat availability may be limited to certain dates and/or flights and it may be more difficult to book seats around public holidays, school holidays or special events. Some flights may not have any seats available for redemption. Route availability is subject to change without notice. All travel is subject to the American Express Flight Offer Conditions.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Participating retailers include the following merchants who have been classified as "major supermarkets": Bi-Lo, Flemings, Safeway, Woolworths, Coles, IGA, Franklins, Fishers, Fresh Provisions, Food For Less, Supabarn, Macro Wholefoods. Participating retailers include the following merchants who have been classified as "major petrol stations": BP, Shell, Caltex, Woolworths, 7-Eleven, Woolworths Petrol, Safeway Petrol, Peak & Gull. Exceptions may apply if an individual merchant trading as one of the abovenamed retailers does not accept American Express as a form of payment. Purchases at major supermarket and major petrol station retailers are only eligible for additional points if the transactions are made in Australia.
card.terms-full:
• All flights are subject to availability and American Express does not guarantee that seats or tickets will be available on the dates or at the times you may wish to fly. Seat availability may be limited to certain dates and/or flights and it may be more difficult to book seats around public holidays, school holidays or special events. Some flights may not have any seats available for redemption. Route availability is subject to change without notice. All travel is subject to the American Express Flight Offer Conditions.
  • American Express Platinum Edge Credit Card Insurances are underwritten by ACE Insurance Limited (ABN 23 001 642 020, AFSL No. 239687) (ACE) and are subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions contained in the American Express Platinum Edge Credit Card Insurances policy of insurance between American Express Australia Limited (ABN 92 108 952 085, AFSL No. 291313) (American Express) and ACE. This site does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. It is important for you to read the Terms and Conditions and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Participating retailers include the following merchants who have been classified as "major supermarkets": Bi-Lo, Flemings, Safeway, Woolworths, Coles, IGA, Franklins, Fishers, Fresh Provisions, Food For Less, Supabarn, Macro Wholefoods. Participating retailers include the following merchants who have been classified as "major petrol stations": BP, Shell, Caltex, Woolworths, 7-Eleven, Woolworths Petrol, Safeway Petrol, Peak & Gull. Exceptions may apply if an individual merchant trading as one of the abovenamed retailers does not accept American Express as a form of payment. Purchases at major supermarket and major petrol station retailers are only eligible for additional points if the transactions are made in Australia.
  • All Interest Rates are quoted as an Annual Percentage Rate. All information is correct as at 16 December 2010 and is subject to change.

card.name: American Express Gold Ascent Credit Card
card.top-features:
• Complimentary access to Membership Rewards Ascent - earn 1 point for every $2 spent1.
  • $0 annual Card fee.
card.benefits: • - Redeem points with 7 airline partner rewards programs including Air New Zealand, Cathay Pacific, Malaysia Airlines, Singapore Airlines, Thai Airways International, Velocity and Virgin Atlantic1.
card.rewards-features:
• - Complimentary enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent1.
  • - $2 spent = 1 Membership Rewards point1.
card.terms: • Enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent required. Enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent is complimentary. If you choose to select the ‘Boost my points (A)’ option on the Card application form, an $80 annual fee will apply to your Membership Rewards Ascent program. Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program. Subject to hotel, car and airline availability.
card.terms-full:
• Enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent required. Enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent is complimentary. If you choose to select the "Boost my points (A)"; option on the Card application form, an $80 annual fee will apply to your Membership Rewards Ascent program. Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program.
  • All Interest Rates are quoted as an Annual Percentage Rate. All information is correct as at 16 December 2010 and is subject to change.

card-group.name: Charge Cards
card-group.group-description:
Charge cards require you to pay off the full amount you have charged each month. By doing so, they can help you control spending and stay on track with your monthly budget.

Charge cards offer a choice of rewards programs in which you can choose to enrol, so you can benefit from spending on your Card.

card.name: American Express Platinum Card
card.top-features:
• Enjoy a higher earn rate in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium - 1.5 points for every $1 spent1.
  • Choice of 8 airline partner programs including Qantas1.
card.benefits:
• - Platinum Travel Service1 - with just one call we can arrange your flights, hotels, cruises and tours with access to Card member-only rates.
  • - Complimentary Priority Pass membership2 - live it up at over 600 VIP airport lounges worldwide.
  • - Access our unique Concierge Service3 24/7.
  • - Airline Privileges Program4 - enjoy significant savings with 13 Airline Partners.
  • - Complimentary Travel Insurance5.
card.rewards-features:
• - Complimentary enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium6.
  • -Transfer your points to a choice of 8 different airline reward programs including Qantas7.
  • - Enjoy a higher earn rate - $1 spent = 1.5 Membership Rewards points8.
card.terms: • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Earn 1.5 Membership Rewards points per dollar spent up to $100,000 p.a. reverting to 1 point per dollar spent thereafter (reset annually). To transfer Membership Rewards points into an airline rewards or frequent guest partner program you must be enrolled in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium and be a member of the partner program. Membership of the partner program is the Card member’s responsibility and is subject to the Terms and Conditions of the applicable program. A joining fee may apply. Award seats are not available on all routes. Please check availability with the partner prior to transferring your points. Charges/levies/taxes may apply. The redemption of points will be administered solely by American Express. A minimum redemption amount applies. American Express holds no responsibility for flight or accommodation availability, which may be limited. This is at the sole discretion of the airline and hotel partners.
card.terms-full:
• All fees or amounts payable in relation to the services are inclusive of GST where applicable. All fees, taxes and charges levied by the travel providers and/or air travel suppliers still apply and these are subject to change without notice until such time as tickets are issued. Domestic ticketing includes New Zealand. Full Terms and Conditions available here. Travel services provided by American Express International, Inc. ABN 15 000 618 208. Incorporated with limited liability in Delaware, USA. Licensed Travel Agent, 12 Shelley Street, Sydney NSW 2000. Licence No. NSW 2TA000113, ACT 212/D, QLD TAG132, VIC 30233, WA 9TA81, SA TTA 214584, TAS TAS064.
  • One complimentary membership per Platinum account, with a reduced membership of USD299 per year available for one Supplementary Platinum Card member per account. Please allow at least 10 working days for your Priority Pass™ Card via post. You will be required to show your Priority Pass Card on entry. Partners and benefits are subject to change without notice.
  • There is typically no cost for Platinum Concierge, although you are responsible for any purchase and/or shipping charges you authorise. Fees may apply for meetings and event planning.
  • Terms and Conditions apply. Airline partners, destinations and benefits are subject to change without notice. All bookings must be made through the Platinum Travel Service and with the Platinum Card.
  • American Express Platinum Card Insurances are underwritten by ACE Insurance Limited (ABN 23 001 642 020, AFSL No. 239687) (ACE) and are subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions contained in the American Express Platinum Card insurances policy of insurance between American Express Australia Limited (ABN 92 108 952 085, AFSL No. 291313) (American Express) and ACE. This does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. It is important for you to read the Terms and Conditions available here and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. To transfer Membership Rewards points into an airline rewards or frequent guest partner program you must be enrolled in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium and be a member of the partner program. Membership of the partner program is the Card members' responsibility and is subject to the Terms and Conditions of the applicable program. A joining fee may apply. Award seats are not available on all routes. Please check availability with the partner prior to transferring your points. Charges/levies/taxes may apply. The redemption of points will be administered solely by American Express. A minimum redemption amount applies. American Express holds no responsibility for flight or accommodation availability, which may be limited. This is at the sole discretion of the airline and hotel partners.
  • Qantas Frequent Flyer members only. Membership of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program is subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program available here. A joining fee applies. Under Membership Rewards Ascent Premium a minimum of 2,000 Membership Rewards points may be redeemed for Qantas Frequent Flyer points at any one time and must be in whole numbers. Once Membership Rewards points have been redeemed for Qantas Frequent Flyer points, they are governed by the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program and cannot be reversed. Award flight availability (particularly Classic Awards) is limited particularly around peak times such as school and public holiday and other peak times.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program. Every $1 spent on your Card earns up to 1.5 Membership Rewards points up to $200,000 each year, reverting to one point for every dollar thereafter.

card.name: American Express Gold Card
card.top-features:
• Enrol in Membership Rewards program and earn 1 point for every $1 spent1.
  • Overseas Travel and Accident insurance2.
card.benefits:
• - Complimentary Overseas Travel and Accident insurance1.
  • - Purchase and Refund protection which will cover you for eligible items purchased with your Card1.
card.rewards-features:
• - Choice to enrol in Membership Rewards Ascent or Choices.
  • - $1 spent = 1 Membership Rewards point2.
card.terms:
• Subject to Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here.
  • American Express Gold Card Insurances are underwritten by ACE Insurance Limited (ABN 23001 642 020, AFSL No. 239687) (ACE) and are subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions contained in the American Express Gold Card Insurances policy of insurance between American Express Australia Limited (ABN 92 108 952 085, AFSL No. 291313) (American Express) and ACE. card.terms-full:

This site does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. It is important for you to read the Terms and Conditions available here and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • Membership Rewards enrolment required. Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Gift Card or voucher rewards are not redeemable or exchangeable for cash or credit and are valid for a period of 3 months from the date of issue, unless otherwise stated. Normal retailer Gift Card and voucher conditions apply. To transfer Membership Rewards points for points into an airline rewards or Frequent Guest partner program you must be a member of the partner program. Membership of the partner program is the Card member’s responsibility and is subject to the terms and conditions of the applicable program. A joining fee may apply.

card.top-features:

  • Travel Inconvenience Cover2.

  • - Purchase and Refund protection which will cover you for eligible items purchased with your Card1.
card.rewards-features:

  • - $1 spent = 1 Membership Rewards point2.

This site does not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. It is important for you to read the Terms and Conditions available here and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • Membership Rewards enrolment required. Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Gift Card or voucher rewards are not redeemable or exchangeable for cash or credit and are valid for a period of 3 months from the date of issue, unless otherwise stated. Normal retailer Gift Card and voucher conditions apply. To transfer Membership Rewards points for points into an airline rewards or Frequent Guest partner program you must be a member of the partner program. Membership of the partner program is the Cardmember’s responsibility and is subject to the terms and conditions of the applicable program. A joining fee may apply.

card-group.name: Airline Partner Cards
card-group.group-description:
Airline Partner Cards are Cards that are co-branded with an airline partner. These Cards are linked directly to your airline loyalty membership and any points earned on the Card are directly transferred to your airline loyalty account.

These Cards also offer unique benefits linked to the airline partner.

card.name: Qantas American Express Ultimate Card
card.top-features:
• Enjoy a complimentary Qantas domestic economy return flight1 between selected Australian cities after your first Card spend on selected Qantas products and services2 each year.
  • Earn 1.5 Qantas Frequent Flyer points3 for every $1 spent on purchases with your Card.
card.benefits:
• - Enjoy a complimentary Qantas domestic economy return flight1 between selected capital cities (after your first Card spend every year in Australia on selected Qantas products and services)2.
  • - Enjoy 5,000 Qantas Frequent flyer points3 after you first spend on purchases with your Card, plus an extra 2,500 points3 after your first spend in Australia on selected Qantas products and services2.
  • - Complimentary Domestic and Overseas Travel Insurance4
card.rewards-features: • - Earn 1.5 Qantas Frequent Flyer points3 for every $1 spent on purchases with your Card, plus an extra point for every $1 spent in Australia on selected Qantas products and services2.
card.terms:
• The Qantas domestic return flight in economy class between selected Australian capital cities is available for booking for Ultimate Cardmembers. All flights are subject to availability and neither American Express nor Qantas guarantee that seats or tickets will be available on the dates or at the times you may wish to fly. Seat availability may be limited to certain dates and/or flights and it may be more difficult to book seats around public holidays, school holidays or special events. Some flights may not have any seats available for redemption. Route availability is subject to change without notice. All travel is subject to Qantas’ Conditions of Carriage and Qantas Fare Conditions. No Qantas Frequent Flyer points will be awarded for travel on these flights. Subject to Qantas American Express Ultimate Card Insurances and Domestic Return Flight Conditions available here.
  • Selected Qantas products and services are: (a) Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account i.e. with Qantas direct or some travel agents, or (b) purchases from Qantas Travel shops. Excludes Qantas Holidays, Qantas Freight, Jetstar and Qantas branded non-airfare products operated by third parties e.g. Qantas Box Office.
  • Subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions, and exclusions apply. Please see here for details. You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee may apply. Qantas Frequent Flyer membership and points are subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program.
card.terms-full:
• The Qantas domestic return flight in economy class between selected Australian capital cities is available for booking for Ultimate Cardmembers. All flights are subject to availability and neither American Express nor Qantas guarantee that seats or tickets will be available on the dates or at the times you may wish to fly. Seat availability may be limited to certain dates and/or flights and it may be more difficult to book seats around public holidays, school holidays or special events. Some flights may not have any seats available for redemption. Route availability is subject to change without notice. All travel is subject to Qantas’ Conditions of Carriage and Qantas Fare Conditions. No Qantas Frequent Flyer points will be awarded for travel on these flights. Subject to Qantas American Express Ultimate Card Insurances and Domestic Return Flight Conditions available here.
  • Selected Qantas products and services are: (a) Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account i.e. with Qantas direct or some travel agents or (b) purchases from Qantas Travel shops. Excludes Qantas Holidays, Qantas Freight, Jetstar and Qantas branded non-airfare products operated by third parties e.g. Qantas Box Office.
  • You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee may apply. Membership and points are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program. Points are earned in accordance with and subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions, and exclusions apply. Please see here for details. To be eligible for all or part of the 7,500 Qantas Frequent Flyer points you must be approved for the Card and make the required eligible Card spend(s). Points are awarded as follows:
    - 5,000 points will be awarded after the first Card spend.
    - An additional 2,500 points will be awarded after the first Card spend in Australia on selected Qantas products and services.
    Maximum number of points available under this offer is 7,500 points. Subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions and exclusions apply. Click here for details. Please allow 6 to 8 weeks after you have made an eligible spend for the points to be credited to your account.
  • Qantas American Express Ultimate Card Insurances are underwritten by ACE Insurance Limited (ABN 23 001 642 020, AFSL No. 239687) (ACE) and are subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions contained in the Qantas American Express Ultimate Card Insurances policy of insurance between American Express International, Inc (ABN 15 000 618 208, AFSL No. 237996) (AEII) of 12 Shelley Street, Sydney NSW 2000 and ACE. The Insurance Terms and Conditions do not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. Insurance Terms and Conditions are subject to change. It is important for you to read the Insurance Terms and Conditions booklet and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • All interest rates are quoted as an Annual Percentage Rate. All information is correct as at 16 December 2010 and is subject to change.

card.name: Qantas American Express Premium Card
card.top-features:
• Enjoy 2 Qantas Club invitations1 per year after your first Card spend on selected Qantas products and services in Australia2.
  • Earn 1.25 Qantas Frequent Flyer points3 for every $1 spent on purchases with your Card.
card.benefits:
• - Enjoy 2 complimentary Qantas Club invitations1 per year after your first Card spend every year in Australia on selected Qantas products and services2.
  • - Enjoy 5,000 extra Qantas Frequent Flyer points3 after your first Card spend, plus an extra 2,500 points3 after your first spend in Australia on selected Qantas products and services2.
  • - Complimentary Domestic and International Travel Insurance4.
card.rewards-features: • - Earn 1.25 Qantas Frequent Flyer points3 for every $1 spent on purchases with your Card, plus an extra point for every $1 spent in Australia on selected Qantas products and services2.
card.terms:
• Invitations are for Premium Cardmembers and are valid for Qantas operated lounges only and are not valid for oneworld® alliance airline lounges, partner airline lounges or associated lounges. Each invitation is valid for a single visit before the date specified on the pass when flying with Qantas or Jetstar. Qantas Club rules apply. Subject to Insurances and Qantas Club Invitation Conditions available here.
  • Selected Qantas products and services are: (a) Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account i.e. with Qantas direct or some travel agents, or (b) purchases from Qantas Travel shops. Excludes Qantas Holidays, Qantas Freight, Jetstar and Qantas branded non-airfare products operated by third parties e.g. Qantas Box Office.
  • Subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions, and exclusions apply. Please see here for details. You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee may apply. Qantas Frequent Flyer membership and points are subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program.
card.terms-full:
• Invitations are for Premium Cardmembers and are valid for Qantas operated lounges only and are not valid for oneworld® alliance airline lounges, partner airline lounges or associated lounges. Each invitation is valid for a single visit before the date specified on the pass when flying with Qantas or Jetstar. Qantas Club rules apply. Subject to Insurances and Qantas Club Invitation Conditions available here.
  • Selected Qantas products and services are: (a) Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account i.e. with Qantas direct or some travel agents or (b) purchases from Qantas Travel shops. Excludes Qantas Holidays, Qantas Freight, Jetstar and Qantas branded non-airfare products operated by third parties e.g. Qantas Box Office.
  • You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee may apply. Membership and points are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program. Points are earned in accordance with and subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions, and exclusions apply. Please see here for details. To be eligible for all or part of the 7,500 Qantas Frequent Flyer points you must be approved for the Card and make the required eligible Card spend(s). Points are awarded as follows:
    - 5,000 points will be awarded after the first Card spend.
    - An additional 2,500 points will be awarded after the first Card spend in Australia on selected Qantas products and services.
    Maximum number of points available under this offer is 7,500 points. Subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions and exclusions apply. Click here for details. Please allow 6 to 8 weeks after you have made an eligible spend for the points to be credited to your account.
  • Qantas American Express Premium Card Insurances are underwritten by ACE Insurance Limited (ABN 23 001 642 020, AFSL No. 239687) (ACE) and are subject to the terms, conditions and exclusions contained in the Qantas American Express Premium Card insurances policy of insurance between American Express International, Inc (ABN 15 000 618 208, AFSL No. 237996) (AEII) of 12 Shelley Street, Sydney NSW 2000 and ACE. The Insurance Terms and Conditions do not take into account your objectives, financial situation or needs. Insurance Terms and Conditions are subject to change. It is important for you to read the Insurance Terms and Conditions booklet and consider the appropriateness of that insurance in relation to your individual requirements.
  • All interest rates are quoted as an Annual Percentage Rate. All information is correct as at 16 December 2010 and is subject to change.

card.name: Qantas American Express Discovery Card
card.top-features:
• Earn 1 Qantas Frequent Flyer point1 for every $1 spent on purchases with the Card.
  • $0 annual Card fee.
card.benefits:
• - $0 annual Card fee.
  • - Earn 5,000 Qantas Frequent Flyer points1 when you spend $300 on purchases with your Card within the first 3 months and another 2,500 points after your first Card spend in Australia on selected Qantas products and services2.
card.rewards-features: • - Earn 1 Qantas Frequent Flyer point1 for every $1 spent, plus an extra point for every $1 spent on selected domestic Qantas services3.
card.terms: • Subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions, and exclusions apply. Please see here. You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee may apply. Qantas Frequent Flyer membership and points are subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program.
card.terms-full:
• You must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee may apply. Membership and points are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program. Points are earned in accordance with and subject to the Qantas American Express Card Points Terms and Conditions, and exclusions apply. Please see here for details. To be eligible for all or part of the 7,500 Qantas Frequent Flyer points you must be approved for the Card and make the required eligible Card spend(s). Points are awarded as follows:
    - 5,000 points will be awarded after you spend $300 on your Card within the first 3 months of becoming a Cardmember.
    - An additional 2,500 points will be awarded after the first Card spend in Australia on selected Qantas products and services.
    Maximum number of points available under this offer is 7,500 points. Please allow 6 to 8 weeks after you have made an eligible spend for the points to be credited to your account.
  • Selected Qantas products and services are: (a) Qantas passenger flights (with a QF flight number) purchased on the Qantas merchant account i.e. with Qantas direct or some travel agents or (b) purchases from Qantas Travel shops. Excludes Qantas Holidays, Qantas Freight, Jetstar and Qantas branded non-airfare products operated by third parties e.g. Qantas Box Office.
  • All interest rates are quoted as an Annual Percentage Rate. All information is correct as at 16 December 2010 and is subject to change.

card-group.name: Business Charge Cards
card-group.group-description:
Business Charge Cards have flexible spend limits designed to give you more flexibility with managing your business cash flow and monthly expenses. These Cards are ideal for business expenses and require you to pay any due amounts in full.

Your monthly statements can be directly downloaded into accounting softwares such as Quicken and MYOB. The annual Card fee is also tax deductable if the Card is used solely for business purposes.

card.name: American Express Platinum Business Card
card.top-features:
• Access to a team of dedicated experts for your business requests 24/7.
  • Platinum Business Concierge and the Business Card service1.
  • Earn 1.5 Membership Rewards points for every dollar spent, transferable to 8 airline partner programs including Qantas2.
card.benefits:
• - Access to Platinum Business Concierge and the Business Card service team 24/71.
  • - Platinum International and Domestic Travel Insurance2.
  • - Download Card statements into Quicken, MYOB or Excel - saving you time preparing your BAS3.
  • - Flexible spend limits4 designed to support business growth.
card.rewards-features:
• - Complimentary enrolment in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium5.
  • - Redeem points with 8 airlines including Qantas.
  • - $1 spent = 1.5 Membership Rewards points6.
card.terms:
• There is typically no cost for Platinum Concierge, although you are responsible for any purchase and/or shipping charges you authorise. Fees may apply for meetings and event planning.
  • Subject to Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program. There may be taxation implications associated with your participation in the Membership Rewards program. You are advised to check with your accountant or tax adviser for further information.

However, original tax invoice retention is required where the merchant is classified as a Mixed Supply merchant
  • Flexible spend limits does not mean unlimited spending. Your purchases are approved based on a variety of factors, including current spending patterns, your payment history, credit record and financial resources known to us.

There may be taxation implications associated with your participation in the Membership Rewards program. You are advised to check with your accountant or tax supervisor for further information.
  • You'll earn 1.5 points for every $1 spent up to $150,000 each year and 1 point for every $1 spent thereafter, reset annually.

card.name: Qantas American Express Business Card
card.top-features:
• Earn 2 Qantas Frequent Flyer points for every $1 spent on Qantas products and services in Australia and 1 point for every $1 spent elsewhere1.
  • Domestic and Overseas Travel Insurance2.
card.benefits:
• - Earn Qantas Frequent Flyer points on all your business expenses1.
  • - Complimentary Domestic and Overseas Travel Insurance2.
card.rewards-features: • - Earn 1 Qantas Frequent Flyer point for every $1 spent, plus an extra point for every $1 spent on selected Qantas products and services in Australia3.
card.terms:
• Selected Qantas products and services are: (a) Qantas passenger flights with a QF flight number and Qantas Club and Qantas Frequent Flyer memberships purchased on the merchant account i.e. directly with Qantas or some travel agents, and (b) purchases from Qantas Travel shops. Excludes Qantas Freight, Qantas Holidays, Jetset Group, Jetstar, and Qantas branded non-airfare products operated by third parties, e.g. Qantas Box Office. Subject to Points Terms and Conditions.

Points accrue in accordance with and subject to the Qantas American Express Business Card Points Terms and Conditions. Exclusions and limitations apply. Membership and points are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program. Membership is only open to individuals. Qantas Frequent Flyer points will be transferred automatically each month to your Qantas Frequent Flyer account. There may be tax implications associated with your participation in the Qantas Frequent Flyer program. You are advised to check with your accountant or tax adviser for further information.

card-group.name: Business Credit Cards
card-group.group-description:
Business Credit Cards offer the flexibility of paying your Card balances over time. Your monthly statements can be directly downloaded into accounting softwares such as Quicken and MYOB.

The annual Card fee is also tax deductible if the Card is used solely for business purposes.

member-rewards.terms:
• Gift Card or voucher rewards are not redeemable or exchangeable for cash or credit and are valid for a period of 3 months from the date of issue, unless otherwise stated. Normal retailer Gift Card and voucher conditions apply.
  • Points may be redeemed by the Basic Cardmember for a credit on the Primary Card Account. American Express may decline Points for Credit request where the Card Account or Cardmember’s other accounts with American Express are not in good standing. The redemption of Points for Credit will be administered solely by American Express within 3 business days and cannot be reversed. Redeeming Points for Credit is not available for redemption by Corporate Card accounts and is not redeemable for cash via credit balance refund.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program available here. Travelscene Pty. Ltd. Licence Nos. NSW 2TA003629, VIC 32089, SA TTA163633, QLD 1431, WA 9TA974. Harvey World Travel Franchises Pty. Ltd. Licence Nos: A.C.T: TC373, NSW/WA: 2TA5129, NT: NT001, QLD: TAG 1718, SA: TTA 165258, TAS: TAS 069, VIC: 32392. Each Travelscene American Express and some Harvey World Travel shops are independently owned and have their own travel agent's licence. Travel Agent service charges may apply.
  • Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program. Partner Terms and Conditions apply. Available to Australian enrolees who reside in Australia only. A minimum of 7,500 points must be redeemed at any one time. Copyright Webjet Marketing Pty. Ltd. ACN 063 430 848, ABN 8406 3430 848. Part of the Webjet Limited. Travel Agent Licence No. 32282.
  • Only available to Cardmembers enrolled in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium, Ascent, Choices or Blue Sky. Membership Rewards enrolment required (an annual fee may apply). Subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Membership Rewards program. American Express International, Inc. (ABN 15 000 618 208). Incorporated with limited liability in Delaware, USA. Licensed Travel Agent, 12 Shelley Street, Sydney NSW. Licence No. NSW 2TA000113, VIC 30233, QLD TAG132, WA 9TA81, SA-TTA30, TAS-TAS064, ACT 212/D. All travel arrangements must be prepaid prior to departure to be eligible for Membership Rewards redemptions. Membership Rewards redemptions cannot be used for Cruise Privileges bookings. Travel Services are arranged by American Express International Inc. (ABN 15 000 618 208).
  • To transfer Membership Rewards points into an airline rewards or frequent guest partner program you must be enrolled in Membership Rewards Ascent or Ascent Premium and be a member of the partner program. Membership of the partner program is the Cardmembers responsibility and is subject to the Terms and Conditions of the applicable program. A joining fee may apply.
  • To transfer Membership Rewards points into an airline rewards or frequent guest partner program you must be a member of the partner program. Membership of the partner program is the Cardmembers responsibility and is subject to the Terms and Conditions of the applicable program. A joining fee may apply.
  • To transfer Membership Rewards points to Qantas Frequent Flyer program you must be enrolled in Membership Rewards Ascent Premium and a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn and redeem points. A joining fee applies. Membership and points are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program.
